sen.j: 奈良県立民俗博物館（ならけんりつみんぞくはくぶつかん）は、奈良県大和郡山市矢田町にある博物館である。
sen.e: Nara Prefectural Museum of Folklore is a museum located in Yata-cho, Yamatokoriyama City, Nara Prefecture.
Nara Prefectural Museum of Folklore is a museum located in Yata-cho, Yamatokoriyama City, Nara Prefecture.
Nara Prefectural Museum of Folklore is a museum located in Yata-cho, Yamatokoriyama City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 博物館の立地する場所である 奈良県立大和民俗公園（ならけんりつやまとみんぞくこうえん） についても記載する。
sen.e: Descriptions here are also made for Yamato Minzoku Park where this museum is located.
Descriptions here are also made for Yamato Minzoku Park where this museum is located.
Descriptions here are also made for Yamato Minzoku Park where this museum is located.
It opened in 1974.
It opened in 1974.
It opened in 1974.

sen.j: 大和民俗公園の 約26.6ヘクタールの敷地内には自然林が残され、ウメやハナショウブなどが整備されている。
sen.e: In the approx. 26.6-hectare Yamato Minzoku Park, natural forests still remain, and trees and flowers, such as Japanese plums and Japanese irises, are planted neatly.
In the approx. 26.6 hectare Yamato Minzoku Park, natural forests still remain, and trees and flowers, such as Japanese plums and Japanese irises, are planted neatly.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除しました。
sen.e: In the approx. 26.6 hectare Yamato Minzoku Park, natural forests still remain, and trees and flowers, such as Japanese plums and Japanese irises, are planted neatly.

sen.j: 敷地の南東寄り中央に博物館施設がある。
sen.e: Nara Prefectural Museum of Folklore is located at the center of the slightly southeastern part of the premises.
Nara Prefectural Museum of Folklore is located at the center of the slightly southeastern part of the premises.
Nara Prefectural Museum of Folklore is located at the center of the slightly southeastern part of the premises.
The museum of folklore
The museum of folklore
The museum of folklore

sen.j: 奈良に暮らす人々の農具などの生活用具などを収集し、これらを保存、展示公開している。
sen.e: Instruments having been necessary for people living in Nara, such as farming tools, have been collected, kept and exhibited publicly.
Instruments having been necessary for people living in Nara, such as farming tools, have been collected, kept and exhibited publicly.
Instruments having been necessary for people living in Nara, such as farming tools, have been collected, kept and exhibited publicly.
Yamato Minzoku Park
Yamato Minzoku Park
Yamato Minzoku Park

sen.j: 奈良県内各所で江戸時代に建てられ実際に使われていた茅葺などの様々な建築様式の家屋（民家・土蔵）11件（15棟）を移築・展示している。
sen.e: Houses (private houses and dozo warehouses (warehouses made of soil)) in various building styles, all of which were built in the Edo period and have been used in various places in Nara Prefecture, eleven items and 15 buildings in total, including thatched roof houses, were disassembled and reconstructed there, and are now exhibited there

Houses (private houses and dozo warehouses [warehouses made of soil]) in various building styles, all of which were built in the Edo period and have been used in various places in Nara Prefecture, eleven items and 15 buildings in total, including thatched roof houses, were disassembled and reconstructed there, and are now exhibited there.
sen.cmt: 括弧内括弧を[]に訂正しました。ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: Houses (private houses and dozo warehouses [warehouses made of soil]) in various building styles, all of which were built in the Edo period and have been used in various places in Nara Prefecture, eleven items and 15 buildings in total, including thatched roof houses, were disassembled and reconstructed there, and are now exhibited there.

sen.j: うち、2件（3棟）が日本国の重要文化財、7件（10棟）が奈良県指定有形文化財となっている。
sen.e: Of them, two items (three buildings) are designated as national important cultural properties of Japan, and seven items (ten buildings) as tangible cultural properties of Nara Prefecture.
Of them, two items (three buildings) are designated as national important cultural properties of Japan, and seven items (ten buildings) as tangible cultural properties of Nara Prefecture.
Of them, two items (three buildings) are designated as national important cultural properties of Japan, and seven items (ten buildings) as tangible cultural properties of Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 奈良県大和郡山市矢田町545
sen.e: 545 Yata-cho, Yamatokoriyama City, Nara Prefecture
545 Yata-cho, Yamatokoriyama City, Nara Prefecture

sen.j: 近畿日本鉄道近鉄橿原線 近鉄郡山駅より奈良交通バス 矢田東山バス停留所下車 徒歩約7分
sen.e: The Kintetsu Kashihara line of Kinki Nippon Railway Company: Get off at the Kintetsu-Koriyama station, use Nara Kotsu Bus, get off at the Yatahigashiyama bus stop and walk for approx. seven minutes.
The Kintetsu Kashihara line of Kinki Nippon Railway Company: Get off at the Kintetsu-Koriyama Station, use Nara Kotsu Bus, get off at the Yatahigashiyama bus stop and walk for approx. seven minutes.

sen.j: 同駅より 徒歩約1時間
sen.e: It takes about an hour on foot from the station.
It takes about an hour on foot from the station.

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道大和路線 郡山駅 (奈良県) 徒歩約1時間15分
sen.e: The Yamatoji line of West Japan Railway Company: Get off at the Koriyama station (in Nara Prefecture) and walk for about an hour and 15 minutes.
